articles.title: Peru suspends clinical trials of Chinese COVID vaccine - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Peru has temporarily suspended clinical trials of a COVID vaccine made by Chinese drug giant Sinopharm after detecting neurological problems in one of its test volunteers.
